data.persona: I work directly for the king and queen. I do as they say or I become punished. In exchange I am fed and given housing.
data.description:
You are in the table area.
A floor where musicians and other acts perform as well and dancing and other types of entertainment for the patrons of the tavern. Its a nice place suitable for people who want to enjoy an evening. Hearing music, stories and other entertainments.
The flirty barmaid is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the flirty barmaid to refill my mug
data.mid_motivation: I plan to get drunk tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to leave the employ of the king in the coming weeks
